DOC.brief_summary: Experimental observational study show vitamin D deficiency may associate increased risk non-bone disease and/or abnormal development system fetus . The aim study determine relationship cord blood 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( 25 ( OH ) D ) concentration subsequent risk morbidity include RDS , PDA , NEC , BPD AND ROP preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Cord Blood 25 ( oh ) -Vitamin D Level Preterm Infants Associated Morbidities
DOC.detailed_description: It show vitamin D play important role pathogenesis long term morbidity newborn . Experimental observational study show vitamin D deficiency may associate increased risk non-bone disease and/or abnormal development system fetus . The aim study determine relationship cord blood 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( 25 ( OH ) D ) concentration subsequent risk morbidity include RDS , PDA , NEC , BPD AND ROP preterm infant .
DOC.criteria: infant < 32 week gestational age infant major congenital abnormality infant > 32 week gestational age
DOC.keyword: vitamin D , Respiratory distress syndrome , sepsis , preterm
